languages.text: "С каких пор ты начала интересоваться моей работой, Идира? Я действовал по уставу, который был принят много лет назад и согласован с Леди Теодорой — думаю, с ее-то решением ты спорить не стала бы?"

"Since when have you taken any interest in my work, Idira? I was operating under a charter that was passed many years ago and approved by Lady Theodora — I don't suppose you would dispute her judgement?"
languages.original_text: "С каких пор ты начала интересоваться моей работой, Идира? Я действовал по уставу, который был принят много лет назад и согласован с Леди Теодорой — думаю, с ее-то решением ты спорить не стала бы?"

traits.locale_text: "Since when have you taken any interest in my work, Idira? I was operating under a charter that was passed many years ago and approved by Lady Theodora — I don't suppose you would dispute her judgement?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Since when have you taken any interest in my work, Idira? I was operating under a charter that was passed many years ago and approved by Lady Theodora — I don't suppose you would dispute her judgement?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Since when have you taken any interest in my work, Idira? I was operating under a charter that was passed many years ago and approved by Lady Theodora — I don't suppose you would dispute her judgement?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Since when have you taken any interest in my work, Idira? I was operating under a charter that was passed many years ago and approved by Lady Theodora — I don't suppose you would dispute her judgement?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “你什么时候开始对我的工作感兴趣了，伊迪拉？我是根据多年前颁布的宪章行事的，那份宪章得到了西奥多拉夫人的亲笔批准。我想，你应该不打算质疑她的判断吧？”
languages.original_text: "Since when have you taken any interest in my work, Idira? I was operating under a charter that was passed many years ago and approved by Lady Theodora — I don't suppose you would dispute her judgement?"

traits.locale_text: “你什么时候开始对我的工作感兴趣了，伊迪拉？我是根据多年前颁布的宪章行事的，那份宪章得到了西奥多拉夫人的亲笔批准。我想，你应该不打算质疑她的判断吧？”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Depuis quand vous intéressez-vous à mon travail, Idira ? Je ne faisais qu'appliquer une charte mise en place il y a des années par dame Théodora elle-même. Vous ne seriez quand même pas en train de remettre son jugement en cause, si ? »
languages.original_text: "Since when have you taken any interest in my work, Idira? I was operating under a charter that was passed many years ago and approved by Lady Theodora — I don't suppose you would dispute her judgement?"

traits.locale_text: « Depuis quand vous intéressez-vous à mon travail, Idira ? Je ne faisais qu'appliquer une charte mise en place il y a des années par dame Théodora elle-même. Vous ne seriez quand même pas en train de remettre son jugement en cause, si ? »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Seit wann interessiert Ihr Euch für meine Arbeit, Idira? Ich habe unter einer Charter operiert, die vor vielen Jahren von Lady Theodora gewährt und genehmigt wurde — Ihr wollt doch nicht etwa an ihrem Urteilsvermögen zweifeln?"
languages.original_text: "Since when have you taken any interest in my work, Idira? I was operating under a charter that was passed many years ago and approved by Lady Theodora — I don't suppose you would dispute her judgement?"

traits.locale_text: "Seit wann interessiert Ihr Euch für meine Arbeit, Idira? Ich habe unter einer Charter operiert, die vor vielen Jahren von Lady Theodora gewährt und genehmigt wurde — Ihr wollt doch nicht etwa an ihrem Urteilsvermögen zweifeln?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「いつから私の仕事に興味を持つようになったのです、イディラ？私は何年も前からレディ・シオドーラから授かった勅許にもとづいて運営しています――その判断に異を唱えているわけではありませんよね？」
languages.original_text: "Since when have you taken any interest in my work, Idira? I was operating under a charter that was passed many years ago and approved by Lady Theodora — I don't suppose you would dispute her judgement?"

traits.locale_text: 「いつから私の仕事に興味を持つようになったのです、イディラ？私は何年も前からレディ・シオドーラから授かった勅許にもとづいて運営しています――その判断に異を唱えているわけではありませんよね？」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «¿Desde cuándo se interesa por mi trabajo, Idira? Actuaba según unas ordenanzas aprobadas hace años por lady Theodora. ¿Pretende ahora disputar su juicio?».
languages.original_text: "Since when have you taken any interest in my work, Idira? I was operating under a charter that was passed many years ago and approved by Lady Theodora — I don't suppose you would dispute her judgement?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Desde cuándo se interesa por mi trabajo, Idira? Actuaba según unas ordenanzas aprobadas hace años por lady Theodora. ¿Pretende ahora disputar su juicio?».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ne zamandır işime ilgi duymaya başladın İdira? Ben vazifemi, yıllar evvel Leydi Theodora'nın onayladığı bir imtiyazname çerçevesinde yürütüyorum. Onun muhakemesine karşı gelecek değilsin herhâlde."
languages.original_text: "Since when have you taken any interest in my work, Idira? I was operating under a charter that was passed many years ago and approved by Lady Theodora — I don't suppose you would dispute her judgement?"

traits.locale_text: "İdira, ne zamandır işimie ilgi duyuyorsun? Yıllar önce Leydi Theodora'nın onayladığı bir imtiyazname çerçevesinde vazifemi yerine getiriyorum. Onun muhakemesine karşı gelecek değilsin herhâlde."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Since when have you taken any interest in my work, Idira? I was operating under a charter that was passed many years ago and approved by Lady Theodora — I don't suppose you would dispute her judgement?"
